message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to make a competitive offer. I'm offering the product to you for $120.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm offering the product to you for $110. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really benefit from having this product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to make a firm offer of $100. If you can meet me at this price, I'd be happy to make a deal.
I understand your concerns, Bob. I'm willing to make a slight adjustment to meet you at $105. I think this is a fair price considering the value the product will bring to you. What do you think?

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to make a firm offer of $98. I've done my research, and I believe this is a competitive price for the product. If you can meet me at this price, I'd be happy to make a deal.
I understand your concerns, Bob. I'm willing to make one more adjustment to meet you at $102. I think this is a fair price considering the value the product will bring to you. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to adjust the price, Alice. I'm willing to make a firm offer of $95. I've done my research, and I believe this is a competitive price for the product. If you can meet me at this price, I'd be happy to make a deal.
I understand your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to make one more adjustment to meet you at $99. I think this is a fair price considering the value the product will bring to you. What do you think?

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to make a firm offer of $92. If you can meet me at this price, I'd be happy to make a deal. If not, I'm afraid I'll have to consider purchasing from John for $150.
